MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW6 , CW7 and CW8 postcode areas of Tarporley , Winsford and Northwich affecting a large number of properties in the area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:18pm. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:32pm on the 29th October 2020.
